snippet: New York’s new floating restaurants have had to navigate bureaucracy, bad weather and boat plumbing in an effort to redefine the once-stodgy dinner cruise.
abstract: Several summer floating restaurants have sprung up in New York City, claiming what has been uncharted territory in culinary world; among them are Grand Banks, North River Lobster Co and Water Table.
lead_paragraph: New York’s new floating restaurants have had to navigate bureaucracy, bad weather and boat plumbing in an effort to redefine the once-stodgy dinner cruise.

headline.seo: Floating Restaurants Try to Redefine the Dinner Cruise
